## ExtrudedPolygonTechniqueParams.maxSlope property

Set to a negative value to remove all the vertical lines, and to a value between 0.0 and 1.0 to modulate the amount of vertical lines rendered.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxSlope?: number;
```
